content.question: The graph represents the net force exerted on a box as it slides across a tabletop. Which of the following expressions correctly represents the impulse delivered to the box during the time interval shown in the graph?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub 1, end sub, t sub lowercase f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 2, end sub, minus F sub 1, and denominator t sub lowercase f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, the fraction with numerator F sub 2, end sub, minus F sub 1, and denominator 2, close parenthesis, times t sub lowercase f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, uppercase F sub 1, end sub, plus, the fraction with numerator F sub 2, end sub, minus F sub 1, and denominator 2, close parenthesis, times t sub lowercase f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, uppercase F sub 1, end sub, plus, the fraction with numerator F sub 2, end sub, minus F sub 1, and denominator 2, close parenthesis, times t sub lowercase f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
